subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In the wake of a 6-6 regular season and the firing of Larry Coker as its coach Friday, the University of Miami is looking for someone to help a program that has won five national championships regain its luster.
snippet: In the wake of a 6-6 regular season and the firing of Larry Coker as its coach Friday, the University of Miami is looking for someone to help a program that has won five national championships regain its luster.
